title: Teaching Philosophy to Children
itunes:subtitle: Philosophy Now Radio Show #3
itunes:author: Philosophy Now
description: Grant Bartley from Philosophy Now talks to Peter Worley, who runs The Philosophy Shop,  and John Holroyd, an A-level philosophy teacher, about teaching philosophy to school children from as young as four. First broadcast on 19 May 2011 on Resonance FM.
